data.title: Backtesting for the European index investor
data.meta_description: Backtest by Curvo is the best backtesting simulator for European index investors. Discover the historical performance of your portfolio and compare it to others.
data.text:
Backtest is a free backtesting tool for European index investors built by Curvo. It runs analyses on the past performance of your portfolio based on the official historical data of popular ETFs.

It relies on Javascript to function though, so please enable it. Thank you!
